2.0.2.name: wordpress/seamless-donations
2.0.2.description: Need more than just a PayPal donation button? Would you like to allow your visitors to donate in honor of someone? Invite them to subscribe to your mailing list? Allow them to mark their donation anonymous? Track donors and donations? Seamless Donations by Designgeneers does all this and more - and all you need to do is embed a simple shortcode and supply your PayPal Website Payments Standard email address to start receiving donations today.
